Title: Oliver Twist
Writer: Charles Dickens (by), David Lean (screen play), Stanley Haynes (screen play)
Actors: Robert Newton, Alec Guinness, Kay Walsh, Francis L. Sullivan
Plot: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
